name: RPG the Game
description:
This is a small "OPEN SOURCE" game created with the rpg maker tool/engine to help you get started with game making. The limit is your imagination.

Includes

4 characters created with the character generator,

4 maps, 2 of which have been detailed

and 2 NPC's to help the developer understand the programming process

A video of how the game was created can be found HERE
